title: After updating Pixel XL to Android 10 I have a lot of issues.
content:
After updating my Pixel XL to Android 10:
1.When I receive calls there is no ringtone and vibration.
2. When I receive calls I hear nothing, same as person on that side. But when I do calls - everything is ok.
3. I can't do screenshots, coz of error.When I try to select ringtone - there is no sounds on my phone (as system think). When I want to send some photos in messengers I can't, there is no images - I can only do new photo. When I try to download something to my phone from the internet- app stucks for 10-15 seconds and then closes. Same to Google Play app - I CAN'T update apps!!! Google play app  finds no updates and CLOSES.
